org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.token.handlers.grant

Interface AuthorizationGrantHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAuthorizationGrantHandler, AuthorizationCodeGrantHandler, ClientCredentialsGrantHandler, NTLMAuthenticationGrantHandler, NTLMAuthenticationGrantHandlerWithHandshake, PasswordGrantHandler, RefreshGrantHandler, SAML1BearerGrantHandler, SAML2BearerGrantHandler

    public interface AuthorizationGrantHandler
    The interface needs to be implemented by all the authorization grant validators.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean authorizeAccessDelegation(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)
      Validate whether the claimed user is the rightful resource owner
      void init()
      Initialize the Authorization Grant Handler
      boolean isAuthorizedClient(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)
      check whether client has authorization to get access token from provided grant type
      boolean isConfidentialClient()
      Tells if the clients using this grant type are confidential or public.
      boolean isOfTypeApplicationUser()
      Tells if the access tokens issued for this grant type go as APPLICATION tokens or APPLICATION_USER tokens.
      OAuth2AccessTokenRespDTO issue(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)
      Issue the Access token
      boolean issueRefreshToken()
      Tells if this grant type could issue refresh tokens.
      boolean validateGrant(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)
      Validate the Authorization Grant.
      boolean validateScope(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
   throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Initialize the Authorization Grant Handler
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - Error when initializing the authorization grant handler.

      • isConfidentialClient

        boolean isConfidentialClient()
                      throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Tells if the clients using this grant type are confidential or public. 2.1. Client Types ... The client type designation is based on the authorization server's definition of secure authentication and its acceptable exposure levels of client credentials. The authorization server SHOULD NOT make assumptions about the client type. ...
        Returns:
        true|false if the client type is confidential or not.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - Error when checking if clients using this grant type are confidential or public

      • issueRefreshToken

        boolean issueRefreshToken()
                   throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Tells if this grant type could issue refresh tokens.
        Returns:
        true|false if this grant type can issue refresh tokens or not.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - Error when checking if this grant type can issue refresh tokens or not

      • isOfTypeApplicationUser

        boolean isOfTypeApplicationUser()
                         throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Tells if the access tokens issued for this grant type go as APPLICATION tokens or APPLICATION_USER tokens.
        Returns:
        true|false if this grant type issues APPLICATION_USER tokens.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - Error when checking if this grant type issues APPLICATION tokens or not

      • validateGrant

        boolean validateGrant(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)
               throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Validate the Authorization Grant. Checks whether the token request satisfies minimum requirements to generate a token in requested grant type.
        Returns:
        true|false if the grant_type is valid or not.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - Error when validating the authorization grant.

      • authorizeAccessDelegation

        boolean authorizeAccessDelegation(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)
                           throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Validate whether the claimed user is the rightful resource owner
        Returns:
        true|false if it's the rightful resource owner
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - Error when performing the callback

      • validateScope

        boolean validateScope(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)
               throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Validate whether scope requested by the access token is valid
        Returns:
        true|false if the scope is correct.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - Error when performing the callback

      • issue

        OAuth2AccessTokenRespDTO issue(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)
                        throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Issue the Access token
        Returns:
        OAuth2AccessTokenRespDTO representing the Access Token
        Throws:
        org.wso2.carbon.identity.base.IdentityException - Error when generating or persisting the access token
        IdentityOAuth2Exception
